articles.title: Chargers standout RB says he’ll play vs. Patriots after missing practice time due to injury
articles.description:
Chargers running back Omarion Hampton is one of six players the team ruled as questionable for Sunday's game against the Patriots.

The post Chargers standout RB says he’ll play vs. Patriots after missing practice time due to injury appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Chargers standout RB says he’ll play vs. Patriots
